    • connect

      public void connect​(ConnectionInfo info) throws java.lang.Exception
      Connects to the mongodb cluster with a list of hosts. Note that the same credentials and database name are used for every host so these must be the same across hosts.
      Specified by:
      connect in interface DBAdapter
      Parameters:
      info - Connection information required to connect to MongoDB
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Connection Exceptions may be thrown by the Mongo driver, as well as host validation exceptions (see com.foodmobile.databaselib.exceptions for a list of exceptions)
